root.title: Tsahir rock inscriptions, The
root.place: 20 km to east of Hovsgol in Tsetserleg somon, Mongolia. The inscriptions are on the Tsahir rocks at north of the Tes river.
root.general: There are some old Turkic inscriptions found on the rock.
root.description: Inscriptions are on flat surfaces of the rock.
root.investigation: The inscriptions were investigated by D.Tseveendorzh in 1981, and C.Battulga 618 conducted special studies and published the text in 1990 and 2008.

pdf.f_in: МУИС. Монгол хэл соелын сургууль. ЭШБ. Tom XXIX (300). Улаанбаатар, 2008. 259-265.
